title: Clothing and Fashion 2
sentences: I would like to try on this jacket.
These pants unfortunately don't fit me.
The colorful shirt suits you very well.
Ziehen Sie sich bitte für die Feier
Please change your clothes for the party.
The wool sweater is very warm.
Ich trage am liebsten Kleidung aus
I prefer wearing clothes made of cotton.
These shoes are made of real leather.
My new suit is very elegant.
Ist dieses Kleid nicht ein bisschen zu
Isn't this dress a bit too tight?
I like loose and comfortable clothes.
She is wearing a golden necklace around her neck.
Have you seen my silver ring?
I have my wallet in the bag.
These earrings are a beautiful piece of jewelry.
I have to wash my laundry today.
Das Kleid ist mir viel zu
The dress is much too wide for me.
Ich ziehe mir nach der Arbeit die Schuhe
I take off my shoes after work.
He is wearing a striped shirt today.
Wir gehen heute in ein großes
We are going to a large department store today.
The quality of the fabric is very good.
I find this style very modern.
Das bunte T-Shirt ist mir zu
The colorful T-shirt is too flashy for me.
dictionary:
anprobieren - to try on
passen - to fit
stehen - to suit / look good on
umziehen - to change clothes
die Wolle - wool
die Baumwolle - cotton
das Leder - leather
elegant - elegant
eng - tight
bequem - comfortable
die Kette - necklace
der Ring - ring
das Portemonnaie - wallet
der Schmuck - jewelry
schmutzig - dirty
waschen - to wash
das Muster - pattern
weit - wide / loose
ausziehen - to take off (clothes/shoes)
gestreift - striped
das Kaufhaus - department store
die Qualität - quality
die Umkleidekabine - changing room
modern - modern
auffällig - flashy / conspicuous
